title: The Northman
synopsis: The Northman is an epic revenge thriller, that explores how far a Viking prince will go to seek justice for his murdered father.
starring: Alexander Skarsgård, Nicole Kidman, Claes Bang, Ethan Hawke

title: TOVE
synopsis: Helsinki, 1945. The end of the war brings a new sense of artistic and social freedom for painter Tove Jansson.
starring: Alma Pöysti, Krista Kosonen, Shanti Roney, Joanna Haartti

title: Alcarràs
synopsis: In a small village in Catalonia, the peach farmers of the Solé family spend every summer together picking fruit from their orchard. But when plans arise to install solar panels and cut down trees, this tight-knit group suddenly faces eviction -- and the loss of far more than their home.
starring: Berta Pipó, Jordi Pujol Dolcet, Anna Otin, Xènia Roset
